name: Sacrifice - Spooktober Jam 2021
description:
"Sacrifice" is my 2nd Game Jam ever, for the Spooktober Jam 2021. Theme was "Sacrifice", if you didn't noticed. I worked on it during my free time, so please be tolerant haha.

The game is a platformer, in which you play as a witch who can sacrifice rabbits to resurrect if she dies. There are 5 main mechanics on which I worked during the week : Jump (which is not as easy as I thought), Grab on platform's corners, Dash, Checkpoints (which is one of the main mechanics) and Opponents (with super-easy AI).

I also made every assets of the prototype ! The only content which is not made by me is the Cinemachine, because I hadn't enough time to work on a camera's script.

Everything is free to use, but please credit me if you do so.

Thus, Enjoy ! I really had fun during this week !
